original: Kindbom, Carl-Axel Erik, direktör, Karl’sborg, f. 16/7/98 i Karlsborg av grossliandlare Axel K. o. Wilhelmina Andersson. G. 3(1 m. Ruth Helgeson. Barn: Lennart f. 312, Rolf 37. — Stud :ex. i Skara 19, kansiliex. 21, hand :sk. 23. Res. t. Norge, Danm., Tyskl. o. Tjeckoslov. Anst. v. tänd-’sticksfabr. i Jönköp. 24-26, verkst. dir. i A. Kindbom A-B i KarLsborg sed. 38. Led. av styr. f. A. Kindbom A-B 0. Skarab. Ensk. Ban’k A-B kont. i Karlsborg, ordf. i allm. lok. varder :-nd i Skarab. 1., led. av komm:fullm. samt ett flert. styr. o. komm. ndr.
translated: Kindbom, Carl-Axel Erik, director, Karl'sborg, b. 16/7/98 in Karlsborg, son of merchant Axel K. and Wilhelmina Andersson. Married 3(1 with Ruth Helgeson. Children: Lennart b. 312, Rolf b. 37. Studied: secondary school examination in Skara 19, civil service examination 21, business school 23. Traveled to Norway, Denmark, Germany, and Czechoslovakia. Employed at a matchstick factory in Jönköping 24-26, managing director at A. Kindbom A-B in Karlsborg since 38. Member of the board for A. Kindbom A-B and Skaraborgs Enskilda Bank A-B in Karlsborg, chairman of the local public guardianship in Skaraborg county, member of the municipal council and several other boards and committees.

organization.name: Local Public Guardianship in Skaraborg County
